/*------------------------------------------------------------------------------
-- 개체 이름 : HVCCD_MES.INF_PMS_MASTER_ITEM
-- 만든 날짜 : 2013-06-04 오후 10:56:34
-- 마지막으로 수정한 날짜 : 2013-06-14 오전 9:48:49
-- 상태 : VALID
------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
DROP TABLE HVCCD_MES.INF_PMS_MASTER_ITEM CASCADE CONSTRAINTS;

CREATE TABLE HVCCD_MES.INF_PMS_MASTER_ITEM (
  ID                 VARCHAR2(64)     NOT NULL, 
  DOMAIN_ID          VARCHAR2(64)     NOT NULL, 
  ROUTING            VARCHAR2(5)          NULL, 
  ST_NO              VARCHAR2(3)          NULL, 
  ST_SEQ_NO          NUMBER(38)           NULL, 
  ITEM_NO            VARCHAR2(20)         NULL, 
  ITEM_NAME          VARCHAR2(80)         NULL, 
  ITEM_ORDER         NUMBER(38)           NULL, 
  LEN                NUMBER(38)           NULL, 
  POINT_UNDER_LEN    NUMBER(38)           NULL, 
  SQC_FLG            VARCHAR2(1)          NULL, 
  TSFR_FLG           VARCHAR2(1)          NULL, 
  UNIT               VARCHAR2(15)         NULL, 
  ACTDTTM            VARCHAR2(17)         NULL, 
  PROG_ID            VARCHAR2(30)         NULL, 
  DOWNLOAD_YN        VARCHAR2(1)          NULL, 
  X_USL              FLOAT(22)       DEFAULT 0.0            NULL, 
  X_LSL              FLOAT(22)       DEFAULT 0.0            NULL, 
  R_USL              FLOAT(22)       DEFAULT 0.0            NULL, 
  R_LSL              FLOAT(22)       DEFAULT 0.0            NULL, 
  MONITOR_FLG        NUMBER(1)       DEFAULT 0            NULL
)
TABLESPACE HVCCD_MES_DAT
PCTFREE 10
PCTUSED 0
INITRANS 1
MAXTRANS 255
STORAGE (
    INITIAL 64 K
    NEXT 1024 K
    MINEXTENTS 1
    MAXEXTENTS UNLIMITED
)
LOGGING
NOCACHE
MONITORING
NOPARALLEL
;

/*------------------------------------------------------------------------------
-- 개체 이름 : HVCCD_MES.IX_PMS_MST_ITM_0
-- 만든 날짜 : 2013-06-04 오후 10:56:35
-- 마지막으로 수정한 날짜 : 2013-06-04 오후 10:56:35
-- 상태 : VALID
------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
DROP INDEX HVCCD_MES.IX_PMS_MST_ITM_0;

CREATE UNIQUE INDEX HVCCD_MES.IX_PMS_MST_ITM_0
ON HVCCD_MES.INF_PMS_MASTER_ITEM (DOMAIN_ID, ROUTING, ST_NO, ST_SEQ_NO, ITEM_NO)
PCTFREE 10
INITRANS 2
MAXTRANS 255
STORAGE (
    INITIAL 64 K
    NEXT 1024 K
    MINEXTENTS 1
    MAXEXTENTS UNLIMITED
    PCTINCREASE 0
)
TABLESPACE HVCCD_MES_DAT
LOGGING
NOPARALLEL;

ALTER TABLE HVCCD_MES.INF_PMS_MASTER_ITEM ADD
(
    PRIMARY KEY ( ID )
        USING INDEX
        TABLESPACE HVCCD_MES_DAT 
        PCTFREE 10
        INITRANS 2
        MAXTRANS 255
        STORAGE (
            INITIAL 64 K
            NEXT 1024 K
            MINEXTENTS 1
            MAXEXTENTS UNLIMITED
        )
);
